species.name: dunsparce
descriptions: DUNSPARCE has a drill for its tail. It uses this tail to burrow into the ground backwards. This Pok√©mon is known to make its nest in complex shapes deep under the ground.
If spotted, it escapes by burrowing with its tail. It can float just slightly using its wings.
It creates mazes in dark locations. When spotted, it flees into the ground by digging with its tail.
It digs into the ground with its tail and makes a mazelike nest. It can fly just a little.
It hides deep inside caves where no light ever reaches it and remains virtually motionless there.

abilities.name: serene-grace
abilities.effect: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.

abilities.name: run-away
abilities.effect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

abilities.name: rattled
abilities.effect: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.
